name: Boxing Manager 2
overview: Are you a boxing manager master or strategy? A game by D&H Sports featuring full graphic fighting, box or manage weights, 3-15 rounds, sparring, strength and stamina training. Fight of the month, roadwork, light and heavy bag work. Manage earnings, defend your title or take a dive for some needed cash. Check statistics for all fighters including opponents, fix fights, do TV and radio interviews and photo sessions. Negotiate price money and so much more with this updated Boxing Manager 2!
